title: 'Perfecto': Gulf monarchs bring A-game to Trump charm offensive
shortDescription: President Trump is touring three of the Middle East's wealthiest monarches. They are giving him a reception fit for an admirer of kings.

title: Qatar welcomes President Trump with opulence
shortDescription: President Donald Trump touched down in Doha, Qatar to a more-than-warm welcome of fighter jets, Cybertrucks, and dancers.

title: House Speaker Mike Johnson backs congressional stock trading ban
shortDescription: Johnson's support may mean the long-awaited legislation may finally have a chance on Capitol Hill.

title: Trump official confirms 9 detainee deaths in ICE custody
shortDescription: Todd Lyons, acting director of Immigration and Customs Enforcement, said the agency is focused on deporting the 'worst of the worst.'

title: House debates Republican Medicaid, tax proposals | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: President Trump pledges to end sanctions against Syria. | Cassandra “Cassie” Ventura Fine testified against ex-boyfriend Sean “Diddy” Combs.

title: How Syria's leader rose from al-Qaeda to a meeting with Trump
shortDescription: "He's got the potential - he's a real leader," Trump said on Air Force One after meeting Syrian Interim President Ahmed al-Sharaa.

title: Poll: Americans worry about Trump's handling of measles outbreak
shortDescription: Just 31% of respondents in a Reuters/Ipsos poll agreed with a statement that the Trump administration is handling the measles outbreak responsibly.

title: Israel intensifies Gaza bombardment as Trump visits region
shortDescription: Israeli military strikes killed at least 50 Palestinians, local health authorities said, as President Donald Trump continued his visit to the Middle East.

title: Federal judge says Trump can use Alien Enemies Act for deportations
shortDescription: Judge Stephanie Haines ruled that President Trump has the authority to deport accused Venezuelan gang members under the Alien Enemies Act.

title: Trump says he will end sanctions on Syria
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pledged during a U.S.-Saudi Investment Forum in Riyadh to end sanctions against Syria.

title: Joe Biden didn't recognize George Clooney at fundraiser, new book says
shortDescription: Actor George Clooney was shook to his core by the state on President Biden at a 2024 campaign fundraiser, a new book says.

title: Four takeaways from marathon hearings on GOP Medicaid, tax proposals
shortDescription: The proposals will become part of President Donald Trump's sweeping tax cuts and spending bill.

title: Trump admin looks to cut Narcan grant as fentanyl crisis beginning to wane
shortDescription: The Trump administration is considering cutting a $56 million grant program that provides the lifesaving overdose reversal drug Narcan.

title: Trump wants Saudi Arabia to join Abraham Accords. What are they?
shortDescription: Trump said during his trip to Saudi Arabia he wants the Gulf kingdom to join the Abraham Accords and normalize diplomatic relations with Israel.

title: Federal trade court hears arguments about blocking Trump's tariffs
shortDescription: Five small businesses urged a federal court to block Trump's tariffs but government lawyers contend presidents have long regulated trade.

title: Trump ends Syria sanctions; leader pitches Trump Tower in Damascus
shortDescription: President Trump, speaking in Saudi Arabia, said he will order the end of sanctions against Syria to normalize relations with its new government.

title: David Hogg may lose position at DNC as panel votes to void election
shortDescription: The credentials committee of the DNC voted in favor of a resolution voiding the election that made David Hogg and Malcolm Kenyatta vice chairs.

title: Aides discussed Biden possibly using wheelchair if reelected: New book
shortDescription: Reporting on excerpts from a new book by CNN and Axios journalist say aides discussed the possibility of Biden needing a wheelchair in the future.

title: Trump administration cancels another $450 million to Harvard
shortDescription: The Trump administration on Tuesday said it would be canceling another $450 million in grants to Harvard on top of the original $2.2 billion it froze.

title: US court to weigh small business bid to block Trump tariffs
shortDescription: Tuesday's hearing before a panel of three judges at the U.S. Court of International Trade will be the first major legal test of Trump's tariffs.

title: President Trump kicks off Middle East trip
shortDescription: A royal welcome for the president in Saudi Arabia as Trump's middle east trip kicks off.
